Welcome Developers!

This is the resource website for the June - August 2014 Front End class in Durham, NC. In these pages you'll find resources, setup guidelines and schedules for the class.

Schedule

This page outlines the daily and weekly schedule for the class.

Setup

Find all the resources you'll need to get your local development environment setup, accounts to sign up for and optional productivity tools we'll be suing throughout the class.

Resources

A list of articles, books and tutorials you might find useful for helping you hone your front end developer skill set.

Policies

A set of policies, guidelines and general expectations we have for our students at The Iron Yard.

Contact

Contact information for your instructor, campus director and emergency contacts.
